Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Specialist \Spe"cial*ist\, n. One who devotes himself to some specialty; as, a medical specialist, one who devotes himself to diseases of particular parts of the body, as the eye, the ear, the nerves, etc. [1913 Webster]

specialist n 1: an expert who is devoted to one occupation or branch of learning [syn: {specializer}, {specialiser}] [ant: {Renaissance man}] 2: practices one branch of medicine [syn: {medical specialist}]
